    "glm"

)

    )

    list(APPEND submodule_dependencies
        "glfw"
    )
elseif(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME MATCHES "Windows")
    list(APPEND submodule_dependencies
        "glfw"
    )
endif()

jfc_add_submodule_dependencies(${submodule_dependencies})
